subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: After some confusion over the rules that govern races in the United States, Lance Armstrong will be able to test himself in a five-day stage race after all. Armstrong, the seven-time Tour de France winner, will line up Wednesday to race at the Tour of the Gila, a race in New Mexico. For Armstrong, who had 12 screws implanted into his broken collarbone last month, the event will serve as a dress rehearsal for the Giro d’Italia in May.
